preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM listnms WHERE listtype in ('TRIAL','NURSERY');

changeSet.comment: update in listnms table the listtype with TRIAL or NURSERY by STUDY
changeSet.sql: update listnms set listtype='STUDY' where listtype in ('TRIAL','NURSERY');
